titleInfo.title: 'File 9/7 Arms & Ammunition. Issue of Permits to Country-crafts to Carry Arms'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: This file has a foliation number on the front top right hand corner of each page. The number is uncircled.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between Thomas Hickinbotham, British Political Agent in Bahrain, and various local nākhudās(dhow boat captains), as well as with Charles Belgrave, Adviser to the Bahrain Government. These correspondence concern the requests of various nakhudas for permission to carry arms and ammunition for self-defence on board their dhow boats.
